patient_safety.name: Patient Safety
key_questions: Could this tool cause harm through incorrect outputs?
What is the clinical severity of potential false positives/negatives?
Does the tool have appropriate failsafe mechanisms?
Is human oversight required for all clinical decisions?

scoring_criteria.1: Minimal patient interaction, no clinical decision impact
scoring_criteria.2: Indirect clinical influence, low severity potential
scoring_criteria.3: Moderate clinical influence, reversible harm potential
scoring_criteria.4: Direct clinical influence, significant harm potential

bias_fairness.name: Bias & Fairness
key_questions: Does this tool perform equitably across demographic groups?
Was training data representative of our patient population?
Have disparate impact ratios been calculated?
Are there known demographic performance gaps?

scoring_criteria.1: No demographic performance variation, representative data
scoring_criteria.4: Significant disparities across key demographic groups
scoring_criteria.5: Severe bias with potential for systematic discrimination

data_privacy.name: Data Privacy
key_questions: What PHI does this system access and how is it protected?
Is there a Business Associate Agreement in place?
Does data processing comply with minimum necessary standard?
Are data retention policies appropriate?

scoring_criteria.1: No PHI access, anonymized data only
scoring_criteria.2: Limited PHI access, strong controls, BAA in place
scoring_criteria.3: Moderate PHI access, standard HIPAA controls
scoring_criteria.4: Broad PHI access, complex data flows, third-party processing
scoring_criteria.5: Extensive PHI access including sensitive categories, cross-border data flows

clinical_validity.name: Clinical Validity
key_questions: Is this tool's accuracy validated for our patient population?
Are published performance metrics applicable to our context?
Has local validation been performed?
Are there peer-reviewed studies supporting this tool?

scoring_criteria.1: Extensive local validation, matches vendor claims
scoring_criteria.2: Local validation shows good performance, minor gaps
scoring_criteria.3: Vendor validation only, not yet locally validated
scoring_criteria.4: Limited validation, significant uncertainty about local performance

cybersecurity.name: Cybersecurity
key_questions: What attack surfaces does this system introduce?
Is the system protected against adversarial inputs?
Are model extraction attacks mitigated?
Does the system meet NIST 800-53 control requirements?

scoring_criteria.1: Minimal attack surface, strong security controls, FedRAMP authorized
scoring_criteria.2: Limited attack surface, standard security controls in place
scoring_criteria.3: Moderate attack surface, baseline security controls
scoring_criteria.4: Broad attack surface, gaps in security controls identified
scoring_criteria.5: Extensive attack surface, significant security vulnerabilities

regulatory.name: Regulatory Compliance
key_questions: What regulations apply and are we compliant?
Is FDA clearance required and obtained?
Are ONC HTI-1 transparency requirements met?
Are state-specific AI regulations applicable?

scoring_criteria.1: Full compliance with all applicable frameworks
scoring_criteria.3: Partially compliant, remediation plan in place
scoring_criteria.4: Significant compliance gaps, regulatory exposure identified

critical.explainability: Full model documentation and clinician training
